org.apache.jackrabbit.jca

Class JCARepositoryHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.commons.AbstractRepository
      • org.apache.jackrabbit.commons.repository.ProxyRepository
        • org.apache.jackrabbit.jca.JCARepositoryHandle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Repository, Referenceable

    public final class JCARepositoryHandle
extends ProxyRepository
implements javax.resource.Referenceable, Serializable
    This class implements the JCA implementation of repository.
